title: Few-Shot MS and PAN Joint Classification with Improved Cross-Source Contrastive Learning

abstract: The joint classification of multispectral (MS) and panchromatic (PAN) images aims to provide a more detailed and accurate interpretation of land features. Although deep learning based methods have achieved remarkable success in this task, the …

title: InternLM-XComposer-2.5: A Versatile Large Vision Language Model Supporting Long-Contextual Input and Output
details: P Zhang, X Dong, Y Zang, Y Cao, R Qian, L Chen… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: We present InternLM-XComposer-2.5 (IXC-2.5), a versatile large-vision language model that supports long-contextual input and output. IXC-2.5 excels in various text- image comprehension and composition applications, achieving GPT-4V level …
